org.spongepowered.api.world.extent

Interface ExtentBufferFactory


  • public interface ExtentBufferFactory
    A factory for creating buffers to store extent data.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      MutableBiomeArea createBiomeBuffer(int xSize, int zSize)
      Returns a new biome buffer of the desired size.

      • createThreadSafeBiomeBuffer

        MutableBiomeArea createThreadSafeBiomeBuffer(com.flowpowered.math.vector.Vector2i size)
        Returns a new biome buffer of the desired size. This buffer is thread safe.
        Parameters:
        size - The size of the buffer on x and z (y in the vector)
        Returns:
        A new biome buffer
